coloredTexts.text: The Longfooted enchantment increases the distance of your rolls
Creatures can be poisoned with a weapon enchanted with Venomous, but this is useless against undead.
Do you have any interesting tomes to share?
I will be a book worm, but I will never fall into uncertainty.
From little tales to enchanted tomes. Everything is interesting!
I know everything, and if I do not, I will.
Ender's Journey? I have never heard of that book. Do you know the author?
